mapper.insert: insert into image values(seq_imgid.nextval, #{imgOrigin}, #{imgName}, #{imgPath}, sysdate, #{imgLevel}, default, #{imgRefcode}, #{imgRefno})
mapper.select: select * from image where img_status = 'Y' and img_refcode = #{code} order by img_no desc
